mapper.update:
update ef_member_approve
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
realname = #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone_number = #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
member_card = #{memberCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
club_id = #{clubId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
approve_status = #{approveStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
approve_img_up = #{approveImgUp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
approve_img_down = #{approveImgDown,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
reason = #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
over_time = #{overTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
approve_time = #{approveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
lifelong = #{lifelong,jdbcType=CHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update ef_member_approve set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, realname = #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone_number = #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, member_card = #{memberCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, club_id = #{clubId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, approve_status = #{approveStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, approve_img_up = #{approveImgUp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, approve_img_down = #{approveImgDown,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, reason = #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, over_time = #{overTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, approve_time = #{approveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, lifelong = #{lifelong,jdbcType=CHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN ema.approve_status IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE ema.approve_status END approveStatus FROM ef_member_approve ema WHERE ema.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND ema.club_id = #{clubId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT u.nickname clubName, ema.id id, ema.user_id userId, ema.realname realname, ema.phone_number phoneNumber, ema.member_card memberCard, ema.club_id clubId, ema.approve_status approveStatus, ema.approve_img_up approveImgUp, ema.approve_img_down approveImgDown, ema.create_time createTime, ema.modify_time modifyTime, ema.reason reason, ema.over_time overTime, ema.approve_time approveTime, ema.lifelong lifelong FROM ef_member_approve ema LEFT JOIN u_user u ON(u.id=ema.club_id) WHERE ema.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND ema.club_id = #{clubId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
